opcodes.name: Trap
opcodes.description: Used in simulator to pause execution, and return control to the simulator's UI.

opcodes.name: Push Integer Register
opcodes.description: Pushes the value of Rx onto the stack (SP) and increase SP by 1.

opcodes.name: Push Floating-Point Register
opcodes.description: Pushes the value of Fx onto the stack (SP) and increase SP by 1.

opcodes.name: Pop Integer Register
opcodes.description: Pops the top value from the stack (SP) into Rx and decrease SP by 1

opcodes.name: Pop Floating-Point Register
opcodes.description: Pops the top value from the stack (SP) into Fx and decrease SP by 1

opcodes.name: Swap Register
opcodes.description: Swaps the integer register Rx with the value of the floating-point register Fy.

opcodes.name: Stall
opcodes.description: Stalls the pipeline at execute for Rx clock cycles.

name: Branch
description: The condition code for a branch is testing a bit inside the Status Register, consult the table to see the short name. In the ASM write the instruction as (B).(COND) where (B) is the branch instruction and (COND) is the short condition code.

opcodes.name: Register Jump
opcodes.description: Sets the program counter to Rx.

opcodes.name: Indirect Jump
opcodes.description: Sets the program counter to the value stored at the memory location in Rx offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Indirect with Register Offset Jump
opcodes.description: Sets the program counter to the value stored at the memory location in Rx offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Relative Jump
opcodes.description: Sets the program counter to (PC + Rx) where Rx is interpreted as a signed 32-bit integer.

opcodes.name: Immediate Jump
opcodes.description: Sets the program counter to the address of the label.

opcodes.name: Immediate Relative Jump
opcodes.description: Adds the offset sign exteneded to 32-bits to the program counter (offset treated as signed 16-bit number).

opcodes.name: Register Jump with Link
opcodes.description: Sets the link register to (PC + 1). Sets the program counter to Rx.

opcodes.name: Indirect Jump with Link
opcodes.description: Sets the link register to (PC + 1). Sets the program counter to the value stored at the memory location in Rx offset by the I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Indirect with Register Offset Jump with Link
opcodes.description: Sets the link register to (PC + 1). Sets the program counter to the value stored at the memory location in Rx offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Relative Jump with Link
opcodes.description: Sets the link register to (PC + 1). Sets the program counter to (PC + Rx) where Rx is interpreted as a signed 32-bit integer.

opcodes.name: Immediate Jump with Link
opcodes.description: Sets the link register to (PC + 1). Sets the program counter to label.

opcodes.name: Immediate Relative Jump with Link
opcodes.description: Sets the link register to (PC + 1). Adds the offset sign exteneded to 32-bits to the program counter (offset treated as signed 16-bit number that is sign extended).

opcodes.name: Integer Load Low
opcodes.description: Loads the 16-bit immediate value into the lower 16 bits of register Rx.

opcodes.name: Integer Load High
opcodes.description: Loads the 16-bit immediate value into the higher 16 bits of register Rx.

opcodes.name: Swap Integer Registers
opcodes.description: Swaps the values of Rx and Ry.

opcodes.name: Copy Integer Register
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Rx to the value of Ry.

opcodes.name: Load Integer Register Indirect
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Rx to the value of stored at the data memory location at Ry offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Load Integer Register Indirect with Register Offset
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Rx to the value of stored at the data memory location at Ry offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Load Integer Register Indirect Program
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Rx to the value of stored at the program memory location at Ry offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Load Integer Register Indirect with Register Offset Program
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Rx to the value of stored at the program memory location at Ry offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Store Integer Register Indirect
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Ry into the data memory location at Rx offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Store Integer Register Indirect with Register Offset Indirect
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Ry into the data memory location at Rx offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Store Integer Register Indirect Program
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Ry into the program memory location at Rx offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Store Integer Register Indirect with Register Offset Program
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Ry into the program memory location at Rx offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Integer Load Data
opcodes.description: Loads the value at data memory address label into the register Rx.

opcodes.name: Integer Load Program
opcodes.description: Loads the value at program memory address label into the register Rx.

opcodes.name: Integer Store Data
opcodes.description: Stores the value in Rx into the data memory address label.

opcodes.name: Integer Store Program
opcodes.description: Stores the value in Rx into the program memory address label.

opcodes.name: Unsigned Zero Extend
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Ry into Rx where the top 31 - _count_ bits are zero.

opcodes.name: Sign Extend
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Ry into Rx where the top 31 - _count_ bits are sign extended.

opcodes.name: Floating-Point Load Low
opcodes.description: Loads the 16-bit immediate value into the lower 16 bits of register Fx.

opcodes.name: Floating-Point Load High
opcodes.description: Loads the 16-bit immediate value into the higher 16 bits of register Fx.

opcodes.name: Swap Floating-Point Registers
opcodes.description: Swaps the values of Fx and Fy.

opcodes.name: Copy Floating-Point Register
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Fx to the value of Fy.

opcodes.name: Load Floating-Point Register Indirect
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Fx to the value of stored at the data memory location at Ry offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Load Floating-Point Register Indirect with Register Offset
opcodes.description: Sets the value of Fx to the value of stored at the data memory location at Ry offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Store Floating-Point Register Indirect
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Fy into the data memory location at Rx offset by I shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Store Floating-Point Register Indirect with Register Offset
opcodes.description: Stores the value of Fy into the data memory location at Rx offset by the value of Ro shifted by S.

opcodes.name: Floating-Point Load Data
opcodes.description: Loads the value at data memory address label into the register Fx.

opcodes.name: Floating-Point Store Data
opcodes.description: Stores the value in Fx into the data memory address label.

opcodes.name: Integer Compare
opcodes.description:
Stores the condition variables.
- Sets EQ if $"Rx" = "Ry"$
- Sets GT if $"Rx" > "Ry"$
- Sets LT if $"Rx" < "Ry"$
- Sets GE if $"Rx" >= "Ry"$
- Sets LE if $"Rx" <= "Ry"$

opcodes.name: Integer Compare Single Against Zero
opcodes.description:
Stores the condition variables.
- Sets EQ if $"Rx" = 0$
- Sets GT if $"Rx" > 0$
- Sets LT if $"Rx" < 0$
- Sets GE if $"Rx" >= 0$
- Sets LE if $"Rx" <= 0$
- Sets EVEN if $"Rx" % 2 = 0$

opcodes.name: Add Unsigned Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry + Rz.\
Sets overflow bit if $"Ry" + "Rz" >= 2^32$

opcodes.name: Subtract Unsigned Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry - Rz.\
Sets underflow bit if $"Ry" - "Rz" < 0$

opcodes.name: Multiply Unsigned Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry \* Rz.\
Sets overflow bit if $"Ry" times "Rz" >= 2^32$

opcodes.name: Divide Unsigned Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry / Rz.\
Sets divide by zero bit if $"Rz" = 0$

opcodes.name: Modulo Unsigned Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry % Rz.\
Sets divide by zero bit if $"Rz" = 0$

opcodes.name: Add Signed Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry + Rz (treats all registers as signed).\
Sets overflow bit if $"Ry" + "Rz" >= 2^31 - 1$. Sets underflow bit if $"Ry" + "Rz" < -2^31$.

opcodes.name: Subtract Signed Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry - Rz (treats all registers as signed).\
Sets overflow bit if $"Ry" - "Rz" >= 2^31 - 1$. Sets underflow bit if $"Ry" - "Rz" < -2^31$.

opcodes.name: Multiply Signed Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry \* Rz (treats all registers as signed).\
Sets overflow bit if $"Ry" times "Rz" >= 2^31 - 1$. Sets underflow bit if $"Ry" times "Rz" < -2^31$.

opcodes.name: Divide Signed Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry / Rz (treats all registers as signed).\
Sets divide by zero bit if $"Rz" = 0$

opcodes.name: Modulo Signed Integer
opcodes.description:
Sets Rx := Ry % Rz (treats all registers as signed).\
Sets divide by zero bit if $"Rz" = 0$.

opcodes.name: Bitwise AND
opcodes.description: Sets Rx := Ry & Rz.

opcodes.name: Bitwise OR
opcodes.description: Sets Rx := Ry | Rz

opcodes.name: Bitwise NOT
opcodes.description: Sets Rx := ~Ry

opcodes.name: Bitwise XOR
opcodes.description: Sets Rx := Ry ^ Rz

opcodes.name: Logical Shift Left
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry left by value bits, where 0 is the new value on the right and the extra bit falls off. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Logical Shift Right
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry right by value bits, where 0 is the new value on the left and the extra bit falls off. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Arithmetic Shift Left
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry left by value bits, where 0 is the new value on the right and only up to the 31st bit, the 32nd bit remains untouched. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Arithmetic Shift Right
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry right by value bits, where the 32nd bit is now the value of what it was previously and the extra bit falls off. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Rotate Right
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry right by value bits, the bit that falls off gets shifted back in. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Logical Shift Left Register
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry left by value bits, where 0 is the new value on the right and the extra bit falls off. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Logical Shift Right Register
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry right by value bits, where 0 is the new value on the left and the extra bit falls off. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Arithmetic Shift Left Register
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry left by value bits, where 0 is the new value on the right and only up to the 31st bit, the 32nd bit remains untouched. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Arithmetic Shift Right Register
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry right by value bits, where the 32nd bit is now the value of what it was previously and the extra bit falls off. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Rotate Right Register
opcodes.description: Shifts Ry right by value bits, the bit that falls off gets shifted back in. Value stored in Rx.

opcodes.name: Map Unsigned To Signed
opcodes.description: Equivalent of storing (Ry-0x80000000) into Rx without loosing any bits due to casting due to signed numbers having one less bit.

opcodes.name: Map Signed To Unsigned
opcodes.description: Equivalent of storing (Ry+0x80000000) into Rx without loosing any bits due to casting due to signed numbers having one less bit.

opcodes.name: Floating-Point Compare
opcodes.description:
Stores the condition variables.
- Sets EQ if $"Fx" = "Fy"$
- Sets GT if $"Fx" > "Fy"$
- Sets LT if $"Fx" < "Fy"$
- Sets GE if $"Fx" >= "Fy"$
- Sets LE if $"Fx" <= "Fy"$

opcodes.name: Floating-Point Compare Single Against Zero
opcodes.description:
Stores the condition variables.
- Sets EQ if $"Fx" = 0$
- Sets GT if $"Fx" > 0$
- Sets LT if $"Fx" < 0$
- Sets GE if $"Fx" >= 0$
- Sets LE if $"Fx" <= 0$
- Sets FINF if $"Fx" = plus.minus infinity$
- Sets FZ if $"Fx" = plus.minus 0$
- Sets FNAN if $"Fx" = "NAN"$

opcodes.name: Add Floating-Point
opcodes.description:
Sets Fx := Fy + Fz.\
Sets overflow bit if result is outside of floating-point range. Sets underflow bit if result is subnormal. Sets FZ bit if result $= plus.minus 0$. Sets FINF bit if result $= plus.minus infinity$. Sets FNAN bit if result is not-a-number.

opcodes.name: Subtract Floating-Point
opcodes.description:
Sets Fx := Fy - Fz.\
Sets overflow bit if result is outside of floating-point range. Sets underflow bit if result is subnormal. Sets FZ bit if result $= plus.minus 0$. Sets FINF bit if result $= plus.minus infinity$. Sets FNAN bit if result is not-a-number.

opcodes.name: Multiply Floating-Point
opcodes.description:
Sets Fx := Fy \* Fz.\
Sets overflow bit if result is outside of floating-point range. Sets underflow bit if result is subnormal. Sets FZ bit if result $= plus.minus 0$. Sets FINF bit if result $= plus.minus infinity$. Sets FNAN bit if result is not-a-number.

opcodes.name: Divide Floating-Point
opcodes.description:
Sets Fx := Fy / Fz.\
Sets overflow bit if result is outside of floating-point range. Sets underflow bit if result is subnormal. Sets FZ bit if result $= plus.minus 0$. Sets FINF bit if result $= plus.minus infinity$. Sets FNAN bit if result is not-a-number.

opcodes.name: Cast to Float
opcodes.description: Converts the value of Ry into a float and stores it in Fx.

opcodes.name: Cast from Float
opcodes.description:
Converts the value of Fy into a signed integer (rounded towards zero) and stores it in Rx.\
Sets OVRF if $"Fy" > 2^31 - 1$. Sets UNDF if $"Fy" < -2^31$.

opcodes.name: Set Timer
opcodes.description: Sets the value of the timer (timer) to the value of Rx

opcodes.name: Get Current Timer
opcodes.description: Sets Rx to the value of the timer (timer)

opcodes.name: Check Timer
opcodes.description: Sets the EQ flag if the current value of timer (timer) is zero and if it is restart the timer to the previously set value.

opcodes.name: Clear Timer
opcodes.description: Sets the timer (timer) to zero.

name: RFU
description:
This section is intentionally left blank as it is reserved for future use.\
All opcodes of this type will be interpreted as a NOP.
